page.title: 16APPLETON ROEBUCK VILLAGE 2
page.content: There is an active{social life}in the village with the pubs,churches.PTA and the Tennis club all contributing to make the year very full. Both pubs are very busy.The "Roebuck Inn" attracts mainly "locals" but the "Shoulder of Mutton"has a restaurant & bar meals & brings in outsiders.Both Landlords are keen to build up their trade & try hard to bring folk in. The{Tennis club with matches,tournaments & socials is thriving.The{PTA}once the main body for social events is less important but continues as a fund raising body & is to renew its activities in 1986. The{Youth club}has twice-weekly meetings in summer and runs a regular swimming trip in winter.{Sports} facilities other than for tennis are lacking as the school field is too small for adult sports.Entertainment is largely family,TV,or village based.
